Package de.a46.memory

Package de.a46.memory includes all classes containing technical functionality for the memory game.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
LoadListener Interface LoadListener defines one method, that will be called by a Loader, when a LoadEvent is casted.
MGUI Interface MGUI has to be implemented by the gui-layer.
MultimediaProvider Interface MultimediaProvider defines methods for creating multimediaData.
ParameterProvider Interface ParameterProvider bundles methods providing paths to external resources.
UserActionListener Interface UserActionListener bundels all methods, that can be called by the gui layer, when an event occured.
 

Class Summary
DelayInvokator Class DelayInvokator allows to do a call on an object delayed by a specific amount of time.
Game Class game is a final state machine controlling moves in the memory.
Loader Class Loader is responsible for connecting to outer resources.
LoadEvent Class LoadEvent wraps information about what is happening during loading images. a LoadEvent is casted by a Loader and is received by a LoadListener.
MProperties Class MProperties provides access to external resources in form ot a properties file.
Multimedias Class Multimedias provides access to an external resource file.
Starter Class Starter is the main class of this memory.
TextGetter Class TextGetter is used to read a text from a file.
 

Package de.a46.memory Description

Package de.a46.memory includes all classes containing technical functionality for the memory game. Main class is Starter which initializes the program. Also essential are class Loader, which reads all external resources, and class Game, which acts like a final state machine and controls the moves in the game.

The connection between the layer represented by this package and the gui layer is made by two interfaces and one reference.

  • Interface de.a46.memory.gui.RessourceContainer (implemented by class Loader) defines methods to provide images, audioclips and text, as needed by differnend gui-classes, but also by class Game (audioclips) and class Starter (welcomeImage).
  • Interface de.a46.memory.UserActionListener defines methods representing all possible user actions that can happen to the gui and must be responsed by members of this package.
  • In class Starter, that is responsible to initialize all components, there is a direct reference to class de.a46.memory.gui.MainPanel.

See the class diagram for this package.
